column4: Hi, can I install an ISO directly from the Ubuntu Live CD (for example if I had some other Linux Distro saved to my memory stick0
if you have a memory stick then you could create a bootable memory stick using unetbootin.
here's how you can boot an iso using grub2. i've not tried it. http://michael-prokop.at/blog/2009/05/25/boot-an-iso-via-grub2/
